subCategories.name: Iron Man
subCategories.description: The genius billionaire Tony Stark suits up as Iron Man, equipped with high-tech armor and repulsor technology.

subCategories.name: Captain America
subCategories.description: Steve Rogers transforms into Captain America, the super-soldier armed with his shield and unwavering sense of justice.

subCategories.name: Thor
subCategories.description: Thor, the god of thunder, wields the mighty Mjolnir and commands the power of lightning and storms.

subCategories.name: Wolverine
subCategories.description: Logan, also known as Wolverine, is a fierce mutant with retractable adamantium claws and regenerative healing abilities.

subCategories.name: Cyclops
subCategories.description: Scott Summers, known as Cyclops, emits powerful optic blasts from his eyes, leading the X-Men with precision and discipline.

subCategories.name: Storm
subCategories.description: Ororo Munroe, also known as Storm, controls the forces of nature, summoning storms, lightning, and winds to defend the mutant cause.

subCategories.name: Star-Lord
subCategories.description: Peter Quill, the legendary Star-Lord, leads the Guardians of the Galaxy with his quick wit, blasters, and iconic red jacket.

subCategories.name: Gamora
subCategories.description: Gamora, the deadliest woman in the galaxy, is a skilled assassin and a member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.

subCategories.name: Drax
subCategories.description: Drax the Destroyer, fueled by revenge, possesses incredible strength and a singular focus on avenging his family's death.

subCategories.name: Spider-Man
subCategories.description: Peter Parker, also known as Spider-Man, swings through the city, using his spider-like abilities to protect the innocent from crime.

subCategories.name: Venom
subCategories.description: Venom, the symbiotic anti-hero, combines the powers of Eddie Brock and the alien symbiote to become a formidable and monstrous vigilante.

subCategories.name: Green Goblin
subCategories.description: Norman Osborn, as the Green Goblin, terrorizes New York City with his glider, pumpkin bombs, and cunning intelligence.

subCategories.name: Black Widow
subCategories.description: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, is a highly skilled spy and martial artist, utilizing her agility and combat expertise.

subCategories.name: Hawkeye
subCategories.description: Clint Barton, known as Hawkeye, is a master archer and marksman, using his incredible accuracy to take down enemies from a distance.

subCategories.name: Taskmaster
subCategories.description: Taskmaster, a skilled mercenary and mimic, possesses the ability to perfectly replicate the fighting style and skills of his opponents.
